selected_links.title: Report a missed collection - Epping Forest District Council
strengths: Provides information on how to report within the required 2 days
selected_links.reasoning: This link directly leads to a service for reporting a missed collection, which is a common customer inquiry.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content answers the question partially. It provides steps to check if a missed collection needs to be reported, but does not directly address how to report one when a resident has forgotten to put the bin out.
Reason.reasoning: Although the content advises residents to report a missed collection within 2 working days of their scheduled collection day, it does not provide an option for reporting a missed collection if the bin was supposed to be placed out but was forgotten. The user would have to remember and follow the steps provided in the content to check if they can indeed report the missed collection.
Reason.next_actions: If not addressed, I would contact the council service directly for assistance as per the reporting link provided in the content.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides adequate information on what to do before reporting a missed bin collection and what happens if the road is in the list of blocked roads. However, it falls short in addressing how to report a missed collection when the resident has forgotten to put their bin out on the day of collection.
